Steadfast Resolve.name: Steadfast Resolve
Steadfast Resolve.fullText:
Oak Shield Attack 11Steadfast Resolve

Your prayers to Melora strengthen your resolve, allowing you to stand your ground.

Encounter        Divine, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Highest ability modifier vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + highest ability modifier damage, and you push the target up to 2 squares.

Effect: You or one ally within 5 squares of you is immune to forced movement until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 401.
Steadfast Resolve.flavor: Your prayers to Melora strengthen your resolve, allowing you to stand your ground.
Steadfast Resolve.onHit: 2[W] + highest ability modifier damage, and you push the target up to 2 squares.
Steadfast Resolve.effect: You or one ally within 5 squares of you is immune to forced movement until the end of your next turn.

Renewing Vines.name: Renewing Vines
Renewing Vines.fullText:
Oak Shield Attack 20Renewing Vines

When you raise your weapon, vines launch from the ground, piercing your enemies with poisonous thorns and refreshing your allies.

Daily        Divine, Poison, Weapon
Standard Action      Close burst 2

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Highest ability modifier vs. Fortitude

Hit: 2[W] + highest ability modifier poison damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).

Miss: Half damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).

Effect: You and each ally in the burst gain temporary hit points equal to 2 + one-half your level and a +2 bonus to a single saving throw, skill check, or attack roll of his or her choice before the end of the encounter.


Published in Dragon Magazine 401.
Renewing Vines.flavor: When you raise your weapon, vines launch from the ground, piercing your enemies with poisonous thorns and refreshing your allies.
Renewing Vines.onHit: 2[W] + highest ability modifier poison damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Renewing Vines.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Renewing Vines.effect: You and each ally in the burst gain temporary hit points equal to 2 + one-half your level and a +2 bonus to a single saving throw, skill check, or attack roll of his or her choice before the end of the encounter.

Whirling Leaves.name: Whirling Leaves
Whirling Leaves.fullText:
Oak Shield Utility 12Whirling Leaves

Your prayer takes the form of leaves in a strong wind, obscuring you and your allies.

Encounter        Divine
Minor Action      Close burst 5

Target: You and each ally in the burst

Effect: Each target has partial concealment until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 401.
Whirling Leaves.flavor: Your prayer takes the form of leaves in a strong wind, obscuring you and your allies.
Whirling Leaves.target: You and each ally in the burst
Whirling Leaves.effect: Each target has partial concealment until the end of your next turn.
